titles.title: Firefighter Cancer Registry Reauthorization Act of 2023
Firefighter Cancer Registry Reauthorization Act of 2023
A bill to reauthorize the Firefighter Cancer Registry Act of 2018.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Firefighter Cancer Registry Reauthorization Act of 2023
This bill reauthorizes through FY2028 the National Firefighter Registry. This is a voluntary registry maintained by the National Institute of Occupational Safety & Health that collects relevant health and occupational information to better understand and reduce cancers among firefighters.
